snippet: “Biograph, Last Year…” by the performance artists Iver Findlay and Marit Sandsmark explores the meaning of memory in the age of the selfie.
abstract: “Biograph, Last Year…” by the performance artists Iver Findlay and Marit Sandsmark explores the meaning of memory in the age of the selfie.

headline.main: A New Multimedia Show Explores Nostalgia, Moment by Moment
